i have not been on american soil since mid-2019. i toured for 7 months and then‚Ä¶covid.

i miss my old community and my home terribly. and i am heartbroken by what has happened in my country since i‚Äôve left. devastated by all of it. i don‚Äôt know anything anymore. and home i come.

tonight i saw another american - in new zealand, i leave in 6 days - and we looked into one another‚Äôs eyes and burst into tears. 

i want to share today‚Äôs post from @HC_Richardson, which every american should read.
